data.title: Newtons Cradle
data.meta_description: GlassCradle is one of a kind since is the only newtons cradle made of glass.
data.text:
Worth the money

I purchased this for my husbands office. He loved it. It is great quality and a good size for his desk. I did not see any flaws. The only thing I would suggest is be careful when you take it out of the box because the strings might get a little stick to the foam

Is not a big deal but better to be precautious since the balls need to be aligned to bounce very well. Worth the money

Best Cradle I’ve ever bought

I like the glass base , I have seen one like this before, so as soon as I saw it I had to get it. The boxing is very well done, perfect for a present. Unlike the ones I have purchased in the past this one came assembled and all the balls were perfectly aligned. It actually bounces more than 40 seconds. Can’t wait to put it in my office. The only thing I will suggest is to remove the foam very carefully so you can take out the glass cradle easily.

This product is a must buy for all physics big fans like myself.

Very happy with my purchase

I always wanted this kinetic toy but with a base that was not black. When I saw this one I bought it right away. The balls are heavy enough to bounce for more than 40 seconds. This is well constructed and looks great specially in an office. The size is perfect. You dont even need to bother to put it together because it comes already assembled.

Best cradle ever

I am a physics geek and always like kinetic toys. In high school I remember my parents got me a cradle and I loved it. However I always thought a plain dark base was boring. When I saw this one was made of glass I did not think it twice I had to buy it. The product is amazing. Top quality and the packing looks great.

It come already assembled so I just had to take it from the foam box and it was ready

I have already order 3 more for my kids

Amazing, really fancy

Amazing product. It looks so fancy. It comes already assembled and ready to be used. It looks great in my office. You can tell this newton cradle is high quality not only because of the balls and bars are stainless stell but also because the glass base has no sharp corners. The glass base is heavy and beautiful. Will buy again for sure

Simply the best

I bought it for my sister’s office and she loves it. Looks very nice and the quality is great. The best part is that it comes already assembled and ready to use. I am planning on getting a few for Christmas this year. The product arrived with a high quality box.

Stands out from everything else!

So happy with this cradle!

I got it as a present for my birthday and I absolutely love it.

I love physics and I had a few cradles before but they were all black, this one is gorgeous.

The base is made of glass, which makes it stand out from everything else I have in my office.

Great quality! Very happy!

Professional and Sharp-Looking

Ordered this one as a present for my brother and he loved it! He brought it to his office.

The glass base stands out from a few other cradles I’ve bought before. It arrived in perfect condition and very fast. Now I am getting one for my boss for Christmas!

Great gift idea

Beautiful design

Got it as a gift for christmas for one of my cousins but it looked so good that I had to buy one for myself. Balls are aligned and tangle for up to 40ish seconds

Product is perfect for kids that love physics

Stands out from everything else!

So happy with this cradle!

I got it as a present for my birthday and I absolutely love it.

I love physics and I had a few cradles before but they were all black, this one is gorgeous.

The base is made of glass, which makes it stand out from everything else I have in my office.

Great quality! Very happy!

Great gift

My sister bought 5 of these as a present for the kids in her class and I couldn’t resist to take one =) I had to keep one for myself because I knew it was going to look great in my office. You can tell the product is high quality. Balls bounce an average of 35 seconds. The glass base looks well made and is very thick

Beautiful Newton cradle

It came fully assembled which was very surprising since most cradles you have to assemble them. It has this great heavy glass base which I must say looks very cool. My sister bought it for me as my birthday present and honestly loved it. Balls are heavy and the package is great. Only thing will suggest to adults is if they bought this for kids make sure to remove the foam very carefully.

Very pleased with this!

Beautiful glass base with what appear to be solid connections from the strings to the frame. The moment I put it in my office immediately got the attention of everyone. The cradle has pretty good longevity I will say it tangles up to 50 seconds

The only thing I would suggest to everyone is be very careful when you remove the cradle from the box. I plan to buy one for my boss next week

Fantastic Cradle to Enjoy and Display!

The cradle is gorgeous! The spheres are aligned correctly and they knock back and forth between 30-60 secs depending on the force you initially apply. It is definitely one of the best displays I’ve had the pleasure of being able to use for the kids.

Great gift

My sister bought 5 of these as a present for the kids in her class and I couldn’t resist to take one =) I had to keep one for myself because I knew it was going to look great in my office. You can tell the product is high quality. Balls bounce an average of 35 seconds. The glass base looks well made and is very thick

Good customer service

Product arrived damaged, but seller was very responsive, even on Christmas, and shipped out a replacement. The product looks nice, but suffers from the same problems as most Newtons cradles. The precision of construction does not allow for the kinetic energy to be transmitted as efficiently as I was hoping. But it works and looks nice.

This was probably the most awesome product i got!

I had it with me carried inside my bag to show it to my friends 🙂

Amazed hours of fun for the cat!

Absolutely love it! Even the cat loves it, hours worth of entertainment I never would have thought for my cat (whom never tangles or knocks over) when it was intended for me… So will purchase another for my office and leave this one at home!

Awesome conversation starter

Great product, everything was intact and working as it should. The holographic paint really shines as the pendulum is in motion so to speak. It reflects off the metal balls and adds a shimmer effect depending which way it’s swinging. Because of the shimmer effect it’s a great conversation starter.
